tool.name: BS-Seeker2
tool.description: Versatile aligner for bisulfite sequencing data
tool.command:
bs_seeker2_wrapper.py ### define exec path ### --exec-path "/local/path/for/BS-Seeker2" --exec-path "/Users/weilong/Documents/program/BSseeker2" ### output --align--output $align_output --call_methylation--wig $call_methylation_wig --call_methylation--CGmap $call_methylation_CGmap --call_methylation--ATCGmap $call_methylation_ATCGmap --call_methylation--txt
### aligner
--align--aligner $aligner
#if $singlePaired.sPaired == "paired" --align--input_1 $input1 --align--input_2 $singlePaired.input2 #end if
### genome for build and mapping #if $refGenomeSource.genomeSource == "history" --build--file $refGenomeSource.ownFile --build--aligner $aligner #if $rrbsFragments.Fragmented == "Yes" --build--rrbs --build--low $rrbsFragments.lowerBound --build--up $rrbsFragments.upperBound --align--rrbs --align--low $rrbsFragments.lowerBound --align--up $rrbsFragments.upperBound #end if --align-g $refGenomeSource.ownFile --align--db $refGenomeSource.ownFile #end if
#if $refGenomeSource.genomeSource == "indexed" --align--db ${refGenomeSource.index.fields.path} --align-g ${refGenomeSource.index.fields.path}/${refGenomeSource.index.fields.dbkey}.fa #end if
### Inputs #if $singlePaired.sPaired == "single" --align-i $input1 #end if
### Library type --align-t $tag
### other general options #if $sParams.sSettingsType == "preSet" --align--start_base 1 --align--end_base 200 --align--mis 4 #end if
### adapter information #if $adapterInfo.useAdapter == "Yes" --align--adapter $adapterInfo.adapter_file #end if
#if $sParams.sSettingsType == "full" --align--start_base $sParams.start_base --align--end_base $sParams.end_base --align--mis $sParams.num_mismatch #end if

param.name: input1
param.label: Input your read file
param.help: reads file in fastq, qseq or fasta format

param.name: input2
param.label: Input your read file 2
param.help: reads in fastq, qseq or fasta format

param.name: min_ins_distance
param.label: Minimum insert size for valid paired-end alignments

param.name: max_ins_distance
param.label: Maximum insert size for valid paired-end alignments

param.name: lowerBound
param.label: The lower bound for RRBS fragments
param.help: The lower bound for RRBS fragments

param.name: upperBound
param.label: The upper bound for RRBS fragments
param.help: The upper bound for RRBS fragments

param.name: genomeSource
param.label: Will you select a reference genome from your history or use a built-in index?
param.help: Built-ins were indexed using default options

validator.message: No indexes are available for the selected input dataset

param.name: adapter_file
param.label: Input file of your adaptor sequences
param.help: Input text file of your adaptor sequences

param.name: sSettingsType
param.label: BS Seeker2 settings to use
param.help: You can use the default settings or set customer values for the BS Seeker2 parameters.

param.name: start_base
param.label: The start base of the read to be mapped
param.help: The first base of your read to be mapped

param.name: end_base
param.label: The end base of the read to be mapped
param.help: The last cycle number of your read to be mapped
